original_text: This is what it was like to work for you: I worked in the strong heat of the sun in the day. I had pain from the cold at night. I could not always sleep.
korean_text: 내가 이와 같이 낮에는 더위와 밤에는 추위를 무릅쓰고 눈 붙일 겨를도 없이 지냈나이다

sentences.original_text: This is what it was like to work for you:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 당신을 위해 일하는 것이 어떠했는지입니다:

sentences.original_text: I worked in the strong heat of the sun in the day.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 낮에 뜨거운 햇볕 아래에서 일했습니다.

sentences.original_text: I had pain from the cold at night.
